title: So-called Palace of the Dux
description: A large building complex located on the western hill of Apollonia, probably built between the fifth and sixth centuries A.D. Its position and size, the presence of a chapel with a reliquary, and some public rooms led Goodchild to identify it as the residence of the Dux.

properties.description: Representative OpenStreetMap location of the ruins of a rich architectural complex in Apollonia (modern Marsa Susa).
properties.title: OSM location of the so-called Palace of the Dux in Apollonia
